nodes.text: Yoda's Puzzles is a Star Wars activity book. The 96-page title was published on February 8, 2018.

Use your Jedi wisdom to solve Master Yoda's brain-bending riddles and puzzles! This illustrated book of brainteasers, logic problems, word games and more will test the powers of Padawans, Knights and even Jedi Masters.
Do, or do not - there is no try...
